head.title: COVID-19 - Elma School District

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: School Board Meeting Agendas and Minutes
a.span: School Board Meeting Agendas and Minutes

li.a: School Board Meeting Agendas and Minutes

nav.div: Elma School District » News » What's New » COVID-19

span.br:
Dear Elma Families,
This afternoon, Governor Inslee announced that all Washington schools would be closing by Tuesday, March 17, 2020 due to the coronavirus pandemic. Therefore, Elma Schools will have our last day with students on Monday March 16. School is scheduled to resume on Monday, April 27, 2020. During this period, there will be no extra-curricular activities and our facilities will also be closed to public use. In the coming days we will be communicating more information about how we will provide meals and other supports to students during this closure.
Esta tarde el Gobernador Inslee anuncio que todas las escuelas de Washington cerraran para el martes, 17 de marzo, 2020 por el corona virus. Asi que las escuelas de Elma tendran su ultimo dia de clases el lunes, 16 de marzo. Las escuelas comenzaran de nuevo el lunes, 27 de abril, 2020. Durante este tiempo, no habra actividades extras y nuestros edificios estaran cerrados al publico. En los dias por venir les estaremos comunicando mas informacion de como proveeremos comidas y apoyo a los estudiantes durante este tiempo.

div.p: Elma School District does not discriminate in any programs or activities on the basis of sex, race, creed, religion, color, national origin, age, veteran or military status, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, disability, or the use of a trained dog guide or service animal and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following employee(s) has been designated to handle questions and complaints of alleged discrimination: Civil Rights and Title IX Coordinator: Kevin Acuff, 360-482-2822, kacuff@eagles.edu; and 504 Coordinator: Stacey Rockey, 360-482-1123, srockey@eagles.edu. Address: 1235 Monte Elma Road, Elma, WA 98541.
